      • get

        public java.util.List<org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord> get(java.lang.String key,
                                                        java.lang.String nameOfAttributeForExclusionSet,
                                                        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> attributeValuesToExclude)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Get all records with the key Optionally exclude records with some attribute contained in a set of values to exclude
        Parameters:
        key - The key to search for
        nameOfAttributeForExclusionSet - The name of the attribute to check for exclusion, or null if not using
        attributeValuesToExclude - The attribute values to exclude, or null if not using
        Returns:
        The set of records with the desired key, minus records with the other attribute contained in the exclusion set
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
